note.p: Death: His residence, the Swallowgate, St Andrews, Fife (30 January 1908)

Career: Assistant, Hunterian Museum, Royal College of Surgeons of England (1862-1867); Curator, Museum of Royal College of Surgeons, Edinburgh (1869); Pathologist, Royal Infirmary, Edinburgh; Chandos Professor of Medicine and Anatomy, University of St Andrews (1875)
Notes: Henry Holland has signed the election certificate twice
